thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-S&P Raises Lithuania’s Sovereign Credit Rating To A From A-; Lowers Outlook To Stable From Positive

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-S&P Raises Lithuania’s Sovereign Credit Rating To A From A-; Lowers Outlook To Stable From Positive
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - S&P:
* S&P RAISES LITHUANIA’S SOVEREIGN CREDIT RATING TO A FROM A-; LOWERS OUTLOOK TO STABLE FROM POSITIVE
* S&P SAYS LITHUANIA UPGRADED TO‘A/A-1’ ON STRONG GROWTH AND PUBLIC FINANCES; OUTLOOK STABLE
* S&P SAYS EXPECTS THAT LITHUANIA’S ECONOMY WILL CONTINUE ON A STEADY GROWTH PATH OVER THE NEXT FOUR YEARS
* S&P SAYS UPGRADE REFLECTS LITHUANIA'S STRONG ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT OVER THE PAST YEARS, "ROBUST" GROWTH PROSPECTS IN THE NEAR TERM Source text: ( bit.ly/2oCyoUQ )
